backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a social app backend with user creation, post creation, banana reactions, and follow/unfollow functionality using mutable Maps for storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (global feed, compose post, profile page, visual theme) to their associated source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose of every component, hook, page, and config file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, card, chart colors, sidebar) using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Banana Social App' that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for `/feed` and `/profile/$userId`, wraps all routes in a Layout, and redirects `/` to `/feed`.
frontend/src/components/ComposePost.tsx: Post composition component with a textarea (280-character limit with color-coded counter), banana-themed submit button, and Cmd/Ctrl+Enter keyboard shortcut support.
frontend/src/components/CreateProfileMod: Modal dialog for new users to create a profile by entering a username and selecting an avatar emoji from a predefined grid, with validation and error display.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: App footer displaying the BananaSocial copyright, banana emoji branding, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with dynamic UTM tracking based on the current hostname.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper component that renders the Navigation bar and Footer around a full-height flex-column main content area.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, Feed link, and a Profile link that resolves the current user's principal from the actor's agent.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a single post with author avatar, username, timestamp, content, and a banana-reaction button with optimistic animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hook that fetches the logged-in user from the backend using the actor's principal, and exposes a mutation to create a new user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context (login, clear, identity, status) via a React context and AuthClient, with idle handling disabled by default.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations: fetching/creating posts, reacting to posts, and fetching/creating/following/unfollowing users.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Nunito fonts and defining Tailwind base/utility layers with a banana-themed light and dark color token system using OKLCH variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Main feed page that displays all posts in reverse-chronological order with a compose box, banana reaction buttons, and a create-profile modal for new users. Fetches post authors in bulk and determines the current user's principal to manage profile creation flow.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page that shows a user's avatar, username, follower/following counts, and their posts, with a follow/unfollow toggle button. Parses the userId route param as a Principal and uses query hooks to load profile data and the current user's following list.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining the banana-themed color palette (using OKLCH variables), custom fonts (Nunito/Nunito Sans), extended border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations including a banana-bounce effect.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking the current version, feature inventory, known issues, and pending action requests for the banana-themed social platform built with React and Motoko on ICP.
